[BEGIN]
Bypass Cheat Detection RoVu:Path of Heroes v2.9.1

1st Patch

instruction:
1. Rebuild APK with 1stPatch-com.us.ragnarok
2. Rebuild APK with 2ndPath-com.us.ragnarok
   ( "Rebuild & Install" -> LuckyPatcher -> Modified -> RO.Valkyrie -> "RO.Valkyrie.******.apk" -> Rebuild -> 2ndPath-com.us/ragnarok ) 
3. Install Mod APK
